The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
The Voyage of Eärendel the Evening Star

wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|September}}
Events that occurred on 24 September.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1914]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes the poem ''[[The Voyage of Eärendel the Evening Star]]''.
* '''[[1977]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1977]] at The Welsh Pony.
* '''[[1978]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1978]] at [[wikipedia:Oxford Town Hall|Oxford Town Hall]].
* '''[[1982]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1982]] at the Cotswold Lodge Hotel.
* '''[[1983]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1983]] at [[wikipedia:Oxford Town Hall|Oxford Town Hall]].
* '''[[1988]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1988]] at [[wikipedia:Oxford Town Hall|Oxford Town Hall]].
* '''[[1989]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1989]] at [[wikipedia:Oxford Town Hall|Oxford Town Hall]].
* '''[[1990]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1990]] at [[wikipedia:Oxford Town Hall|Oxford Town Hall]].
* '''[[1999]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1999]] at [[wikipedia:Exeter College, Oxford|Exeter College]].
* '''[[2000]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2000]] at [[wikipedia:St Antony's College, Oxford|St Antony's College]].
* '''[[2002]]''' - The GBA version of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' are released in North America.
* '''[[2010]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2010]] at [[wikipedia:Lady Margaret Hall, Oxford|Lady Margaret Hall]].
* '''[[2010]]''' - Lasse Lanta Autumn Meeting of the Austrian Tolkien Society.
* '''[[2011]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2011]] at [[wikipedia:Lady Margaret Hall, Oxford|Lady Margaret Hall]].
* '''[[2017]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2017]] at [[wikipedia:St Antony's College, Oxford|St Antony's College]].

==In Arda==
* {{TA|3018}}:
** From midnight, [[Bag End]] legally passes to the ownership of the [[Sackville-Baggins Family]].<ref name=three>{{FR|Three}}</ref>
**[[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]], [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] have breakfast, and after 10 they continue their walk along the road, up and down the slopes of the [[Green Hill Country]] until the top of a steep bank. They stop for lunch.<ref name=three/>
** [[Gandalf]] crosses the [[Isen]].
**[[Khamûl]] rides on the [[Stock Road]] and senses the [[One Ring]]; uncertain because of the bright daylight, he leaves and waits until the night.<ref>{{HM|RC}}, citing from an unpublished version of ''The Hunt for the Ring'', p. 97</ref>
**The hobbits stop to hide from the [[Black Rider]]. They continue walking parallel to the road. They join the road around sunset.
**They hide in a tree-stump and have a light meal and rest, and resume by nightfall.
** [[Gildor|Gildor Inglorion]] and [[Wandering Companies|his companions]] return from pilgrimage to the ''[[Elostirion-stone|palantír]]'' of the [[Tower Hills]] to [[Rivendell]].
**Khamûl senses the ring again and pursues Frodo.<ref>{{HM|RC}}, citing from an unpublished version of ''The Hunt for the Ring'', p. 99</ref>
** Frodo, Sam and Pippin encounter the [[Nazgûl]] near [[Woody End]]; he flees because of the approaching Elves' [[Elven Hymn to Elbereth|chanting]]. The Hobbits camp with the Elves.
** {{Cal Travel-Boromir}}
{{references}}
